text.name: AEDD
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +1 [Charge] Count for every 10% of missing HP (Max 5)
Gain 2 [Agility] next turn

text.name: AEDD
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +1 [Charge] Count for every 10% of missing HP (Max 7)
Gain 2 [Agility] next turn

passiveList.name: Temperamental Discharge
passiveList.desc:
When hit, spend 1 Charge Count to heal 2.5% of Max HP
At less than 40% HP, gain 1 Charge Count before activating the healing effect. (Can gain up to 10 Charge Count per turn)

text.name: AEDD
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +1 [Charge] Count for every 10% of missing HP (Max 5)
Gain 2 [Agility] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Spend all [Charge] Count to deal bonus Gloom damage by ([Charge] Count * 1.5)% of damage dealt (Max 30%)
[OnSucceedAttackTail] After the attack, lose 10% of Max HP to gain +7 [Charge] Count

text.name: AEDD
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +1 [Charge] Count for every 10% of missing HP (Max 7)
Gain 2 [Agility] next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Spend all [Charge] Count to deal bonus Gloom damage by ([Charge] Count * 2.5)% of damage dealt (Max 50%)
[OnSucceedAttackTail] After the attack, lose 10% of Max HP to gain +10 [Charge] Count

Gain 2 [Agility] next turn

[EndSkillTail] Lose HP by 10% of Max HP to gain +10 [Charge] Count
